<Detail client:only="react">
	![Cool Bits logo](https://bytes.dev/images/content/cool-bits.png)

## Cool Bits

1.  [New npm supply chain attack just dropped](https://click.convertkit-mail4.com/27ur84roxvioh837zzzf3hgqnd444hghm2v3/owhkhwuwrw9xzniv/aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cuc3RlcHNlY3VyaXR5LmlvL2Jsb2cvY3RybC10aW55Y29sb3ItYW5kLTQwLW5wbS1wYWNrYWdlcy1jb21wcm9taXNlZA==). They’ve dubbed this one “Shai-Hulud” because the only way to escape it is to do a funky Crip Walk through the desert at night.
    
2.  Auth0 built [a complete auth solution for GenAI apps](https://click.convertkit-mail4.) that gives you a secure token vault, authorization for async agents, and user auth that allows agents to identify your users. [Try it for free today](https://click.convertkit-mail4.). \[sponsored\]
    
3.  Bogdan Ionescu wrote about [hosting a website on a disposable vape](https://click.convertkit-mail4.com/27ur84roxvioh837zzzf3hgqnd444hghm2v3/x0hph3uewe2kg7a5/aHR0cHM6Ly9ib2dkYW50aGVnZWVrLmdpdGh1Yi5pby9ibG9nL3Byb2plY3RzL3ZhcGVzZXJ2ZXIv). _That_ must be why those high school kids keep asking me to buy them vapes on my way into 7-11 every day.
    
4.  Jake Archibald wrote about how [fetch streams are great, but not for measuring upload/download progress](https://click.convertkit-mail4.com/27ur84roxvioh837zzzf3hgqnd444hghm2v3/6qhehoul7lrxqpao/aHR0cHM6Ly9qYWtlYXJjaGliYWxkLmNvbS8yMDI1L2ZldGNoLXN0cmVhbXMtbm90LWZvci1wcm9ncmVzcy8=).
    
5.  GitHub just launched a new [MCP registry](https://click.convertkit-mail4.com/27ur84roxvioh837zzzf3hgqnd444hghm2v3/e0hph0u707vmx0b8/aHR0cHM6Ly9naXRodWIuY29tL21jcA==), and it’s managed to go almost 24 hours without being hacked so far.
    
6.  Sergiy Dybskiy wrote an article on the Sentry blog about [the top-10 core KPIs of LLM performance](https://click.convertkit-mail4.) and how to track them. \[sponsored\]
    
7.  Michael Lynch wrote about his [first impressions of Gleam](https://click.convertkit-mail4.com/27ur84roxvioh837zzzf3hgqnd444hghm2v3/owhkhwuwrw9xzghv/aHR0cHM6Ly9tdGx5bmNoLmlvL25vdGVzL2dsZWFtLWZpcnN0LWltcHJlc3Npb25zLw==) – the Elixir-like programming language, not the scary glow-in-the-dark toothpaste I impulse-bought on Temu for $0.28.
    
8.  [RustGPT](https://click.convertkit-mail4.com/27ur84roxvioh837zzzf3hgqnd444hghm2v3/z2hgh7ue3e65gwfp/aHR0cHM6Ly9naXRodWIuY29tL3Rla2FyYXR6YXMvUnVzdEdQVA==) is a complete LLM implementation written in “pure Rust” with no external ML frameworks.
    
9.  Mike and Oskar wrote about [how to use Liquid Glass in React Native](https://click.convertkit-mail4.com/27ur84roxvioh837zzzf3hgqnd444hghm2v3/p8hehqu4z46rv8aq/aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cuY2FsbHN0YWNrLmNvbS9ibG9nL2hvdy10by11c2UtbGlxdWlkLWdsYXNzLWluLXJlYWN0LW5hdGl2ZQ==), so you can repeatedly trick your users into thinking they spilled water on their phones.
    
10.  [CarbonQA](https://click.convertkit-mail4.com/27ur84roxvioh837zzzf3hgqnd444hghm2v3/x0hph3uewe2kgkc5/aHR0cHM6Ly9jYXJib25xYS5jb20vP3V0bV9jYW1wYWlnbj1jb29sX2JpdHMmdXRtX2NvbnRlbnQ9c2VwMTcmdXRtX21lZGl1bT1lbWFpbCZ1dG1fc291cmNlPWJ5dGVz) provides high-quality QA services for dev teams, so you’ll never have to test your own app again. Their US-based testers work in your tools, talk with your team on Slack, and let your devs be devs. \[sponsored\]
    
11.  The Safari team wrote about [all the new WebKit features in Safari 26.0](https://click.convertkit-mail4.com/27ur84roxvioh837zzzf3hgqnd444hghm2v3/6qhehoul7lrxqzco/aHR0cHM6Ly93ZWJraXQub3JnL2Jsb2cvMTczMzMvd2Via2l0LWZlYXR1cmVzLWluLXNhZmFyaS0yNi0wLw==).
    
12.  Loren Stewart wrote about how [React won by default and is killing frontend innovation](https://click.convertkit-mail4.com/27ur84roxvioh837zzzf3hgqnd444hghm2v3/kkhmh2unlnwz7wul/aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cubG9yZW5zdGV3LmFydC9ibG9nL3JlYWN0LXdvbi1ieS1kZWZhdWx0Lw==) – similar to how I won my third-grade science fair “by default” after all the other kids’ projects were mysteriously sabotaged the night before. Most unfortunate.
    

* * *


</Detail>

![Cool Bits logo](https://bytes.dev/images/content/cool-bits.png)

## Cool Bits

1. [New npm supply chain attack just dropped](https://click.convertkit-mail4.com/27ur84roxvioh837zzzf3hgqnd444hghm2v3/owhkhwuwrw9xzniv/aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cuc3RlcHNlY3VyaXR5LmlvL2Jsb2cvY3RybC10aW55Y29sb3ItYW5kLTQwLW5wbS1wYWNrYWdlcy1jb21wcm9taXNlZA==). They’ve dubbed this one “Shai-Hulud” because the only way to escape it is to do a funky Crip Walk through the desert at night.

2. Auth0 built [a complete auth solution for GenAI apps](https://click.convertkit-mail4.) that gives you a secure token vault, authorization for async agents, and user auth that allows agents to identify your users. [Try it for free today](https://click.convertkit-mail4.). \[sponsored]

3. Bogdan Ionescu wrote about [hosting a website on a disposable vape](https://click.convertkit-mail4.com/27ur84roxvioh837zzzf3hgqnd444hghm2v3/x0hph3uewe2kg7a5/aHR0cHM6Ly9ib2dkYW50aGVnZWVrLmdpdGh1Yi5pby9ibG9nL3Byb2plY3RzL3ZhcGVzZXJ2ZXIv). *That* must be why those high school kids keep asking me to buy them vapes on my way into 7-11 every day.

4. Jake Archibald wrote about how [fetch streams are great, but not for measuring upload/download progress](https://click.convertkit-mail4.com/27ur84roxvioh837zzzf3hgqnd444hghm2v3/6qhehoul7lrxqpao/aHR0cHM6Ly9qYWtlYXJjaGliYWxkLmNvbS8yMDI1L2ZldGNoLXN0cmVhbXMtbm90LWZvci1wcm9ncmVzcy8=).

5. GitHub just launched a new [MCP registry](https://click.convertkit-mail4.com/27ur84roxvioh837zzzf3hgqnd444hghm2v3/e0hph0u707vmx0b8/aHR0cHM6Ly9naXRodWIuY29tL21jcA==), and it’s managed to go almost 24 hours without being hacked so far.

6. Sergiy Dybskiy wrote an article on the Sentry blog about [the top-10 core KPIs of LLM performance](https://click.convertkit-mail4.) and how to track them. \[sponsored]

7. Michael Lynch wrote about his [first impressions of Gleam](https://click.convertkit-mail4.com/27ur84roxvioh837zzzf3hgqnd444hghm2v3/owhkhwuwrw9xzghv/aHR0cHM6Ly9tdGx5bmNoLmlvL25vdGVzL2dsZWFtLWZpcnN0LWltcHJlc3Npb25zLw==) – the Elixir-like programming language, not the scary glow-in-the-dark toothpaste I impulse-bought on Temu for $0.28.

8. [RustGPT](https://click.convertkit-mail4.com/27ur84roxvioh837zzzf3hgqnd444hghm2v3/z2hgh7ue3e65gwfp/aHR0cHM6Ly9naXRodWIuY29tL3Rla2FyYXR6YXMvUnVzdEdQVA==) is a complete LLM implementation written in “pure Rust” with no external ML frameworks.

9. Mike and Oskar wrote about [how to use Liquid Glass in React Native](https://click.convertkit-mail4.com/27ur84roxvioh837zzzf3hgqnd444hghm2v3/p8hehqu4z46rv8aq/aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cuY2FsbHN0YWNrLmNvbS9ibG9nL2hvdy10by11c2UtbGlxdWlkLWdsYXNzLWluLXJlYWN0LW5hdGl2ZQ==), so you can repeatedly trick your users into thinking they spilled water on their phones.

10. [CarbonQA](https://click.convertkit-mail4.com/27ur84roxvioh837zzzf3hgqnd444hghm2v3/x0hph3uewe2kgkc5/aHR0cHM6Ly9jYXJib25xYS5jb20vP3V0bV9jYW1wYWlnbj1jb29sX2JpdHMmdXRtX2NvbnRlbnQ9c2VwMTcmdXRtX21lZGl1bT1lbWFpbCZ1dG1fc291cmNlPWJ5dGVz) provides high-quality QA services for dev teams, so you’ll never have to test your own app again. Their US-based testers work in your tools, talk with your team on Slack, and let your devs be devs. \[sponsored]

11. The Safari team wrote about [all the new WebKit features in Safari 26.0](https://click.convertkit-mail4.com/27ur84roxvioh837zzzf3hgqnd444hghm2v3/6qhehoul7lrxqzco/aHR0cHM6Ly93ZWJraXQub3JnL2Jsb2cvMTczMzMvd2Via2l0LWZlYXR1cmVzLWluLXNhZmFyaS0yNi0wLw==).

12. Loren Stewart wrote about how [React won by default and is killing frontend innovation](https://click.convertkit-mail4.com/27ur84roxvioh837zzzf3hgqnd444hghm2v3/kkhmh2unlnwz7wul/aHR0cHM6Ly93d3cubG9yZW5zdGV3LmFydC9ibG9nL3JlYWN0LXdvbi1ieS1kZWZhdWx0Lw==) – similar to how I won my third-grade science fair “by default” after all the other kids’ projects were mysteriously sabotaged the night before. Most unfortunate.
